weather_report:
The celestial ballet has gifted Cottesloe with a brilliant spectacle today, and it seems intent to maintain its performance till the day concludes its bow. As light pours from an unfettered sky, the horizon sparkles with a clarity ordinarily reserved for the most exquisite of diamonds. A gentle sun, ever so considerate, bestows upon us the ideal balance of warmth and brilliance, prudently abstaining from any exhibition of overbearing heat. Not a pesky cloud dares to interrupt this divine stage, with the cosmic play of the sun and the earth holding steadfast the audience's attention.

In response to this celestial stagecraft, heed our call to dress lightly; the sun's warmth, though ideal, warrants a certain respect. Allow the airy fabrics, perhaps of a subtle hue, to share in this delicate pas de deux with the climate. Leisurely activities call your name today; a languid exploration of the local park, or an unhurried saunter by the beach could just be the nod of appreciation this beautiful day demands. Immerse yourself in an indoor pursuit if unavoidable, but if the chance arises, seize it to bask in this perfect harmony of light and warmth.
